meanings.definition: A hormone secreted by the pituitary gland that stimulates the adrenal cortex.
meanings.sent1: The corticotrophins help the adrenal cortex work better.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes use corticotrophins to treat certain medical conditions.
meanings.sent3: The corticotrophins threw a party for the adrenal cortex.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like corticotrophins, boosting everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: In the body's orchestra, corticotrophins play the role of the conductor, directing the adrenal cortex's performance.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of polypeptides that stimulate the adrenal cortex.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed corticotrophins to help the adrenal cortex.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes take corticotrophins to enhance their performance.
meanings.sent3: The corticotrophins and the adrenal cortex had a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: His words acted like corticotrophins, motivating the team to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The image of corticotrophins flooding the adrenal cortex is like a vivid painting in my mind.
